medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of epigastric pain with radiation to the right upper quadrant (RUQ) and left upper quadrant (LUQ)
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began suddenly at an unspecified time and has been present since then, associated with nausea and non-bilious, non-bloody emesis once in the morning. The pain is sharp and does not radiate to the back. No fevers, chills, or diarrhea reported. Similar episodes have occurred in the past, which resolved spontaneously.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, prostate cancer status post radiation therapy and Casodex therapy, back and neck pain
